about_the_game:
Officer graphics for Guan Yu will be added.
We will use the Peach Garden Oath as a motif.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Guan Yu. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Guan Yu Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
